reviewText:
The story is simple: Your daddy is killed by a bird. You avenge your daddy.
This game is short, but really awesome! Reach your car by shooting your way to it. Watch out for the walking/flying bird though, they can kill you too!
It's an easy game, it's almost impossible to die, but also almost impossible to finish a level without getting any damage.
After some levels, you get a mini-boss, well... mini isn't the best word, I'd prefer HUGE boss. You'll get the joke when you play it.

I would call it an AAA-game, but since that a cheap game like this one can't be AAA, I'll just call it a AA-game. It's only 2,99 euros and completely worth it.

Killing birds is the only thing you have to do. After each level, you go shopping with the money you got for selling the dead birds. You start off with a simple hunting rifle and near the end of the game, you become invincible with your hunting minigun, that's right, a freakin' minigun. It's gets even better! There is no reload and infinite ammo!

This game is great for when you got bored playing your 'daily'-game and need some relaxation. Personally I had a lot of fun in this game, too bad it will only take you around 1-1.5 hours to finish.


Pros
- Kill birds!
- Awesome weapons
- Funny aspects (like the bosses)
- mini-games

Cons
- Game is too short
- Almost impossible to die
- Bad story-line (don't judge)


Rating
7/10
would play again.

Recommended?
Yes, I recommend it. It's cheap and it makes you smile. Eventhough it's small, it's fun. Tips for the developers: Make an 'endless'-mode, just as it says: Running endlessly until you die, with maybe a leaderboard.

reviewText:
here is 5min of gameplay (i have a full run on my channel)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCO2bYTe3CE

This game will make you chuckle at parts though its not overly hard.
Game play consists of avoiding obstacles and clicking birds to shoot them (you can hold the button down for continuous shots).
Most will fly by in the air and will dive bomb you when close though some carry dynamite that will hit you if you let them explode near you.
Most of the ground birds don't pose much of threat until you shoot them or if they have dynamite though the ground is litter with thorns and bear traps.
Each level has a mini game with 3 variations shooting a flock with a mini-gun, shooting cans, or collecting coins.
There are only really 3 bosses, running for your life, the big chicken, and the final fight with the gun packing ostrich.
As you kill birds, collect coins, and collect mushrooms you'll get money to buy guns, and upgrades at the gun*mart.

reviewText:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xn0r7lj_5Oc&index=3&list=PLTj9drPC92M2iXZVy0bCpf02SUE8zLaKG

Caution: this video is not for the faint of feather or the weak of
wing!

Seeped in backwoods, and hillybilly atmosphere, Bird Assassin is a
thrilling emotional roller-coaster that follows the heart-wrenching
tale of a poor innocent man seeking revenge for the death of his
father....death by fowl play!

Our emotionally scarred, mourning hero seeks to kill two birds not
with one stone, but with an automatic rifle!

This game walks the line of insulting itself, and it does it very
well.  It is a fun, simple satisfying experience.  Beware of dynamite
ducks as your blow your way through lines of avian assassins.  A
funny, entertaining experience that I can happily recommend.

reviewText: Bird Assassin is an amazing remake or as some people call it a remastered version of the Witcher 3. The game play is just as good but the graphics are extremely improved from the original game. You can relate it to destiny with the great high health bosses but you can also relate it to Farcry 1 in that the graphics are just so amazing. The game is just so good that i had to do a marathon and post it on YouTube. you can find this YouTube video by searching Charley bit my finger. It might take you a while but its worth it to play this Witcher 3 / quake 2 adaptation. Over all I would like to give it an IGN rating and say that its about an 11/10 but I cannot due to my mom wanting to take away my computer due to adult content in this game, resulting me to give it a:\n9.97/10 IGN Skyrim with birds

reviewText:
Ingredients

1 duck (or chicken) breast, fat trimmed
1/2 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 teaspoon olive oil
1/2 pound whole-wheat pizza dough
3 tablespoons hoisin sauce
1 cup baby spinach, chopped
1/2 cup shredded part-skim mozzarella
1/2 red bell pepper, cored, seeded and diced
4 scallions, thinly sliced
2 tablespoons black sesame seeds

Preparation

Heat oven to 400°F. Sprinkle duck with five-spice powder, salt and pepper. Heat oil in a medium skillet over high heat. Cook duck until browned, 4 to 5 minutes per side. Transfer skillet to oven; bake duck until outside is cooked but inside is rare, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool 4 to 5 minutes. Thinly slice on the diagonal into 8 pieces, then cut each in half. Set aside. Form dough into 8 even balls, then flatten to form 3-inch disks and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Spread hoisin sauce on crusts with a pastry brush. Top with spinach, cheese, bell pepper and duck. Bake until cheese is melted and bubbly, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove and garnish with scallions and sesame seeds.

If it's on sale for less than half a dollar, go for it, otherwise FOG.com it.

reviewText: This game is, ♥♥♥♥ing great. Does it have great graphics... no. Does it have interesting and dynamic gameplay... no. Does it have a good story... no. So why in the hell is it good then? Because it is just a ♥♥♥♥ing good time i guess. The games story is as simple as they come, a bird killed your dad, so you kill all the birds. The gameplay is just holding down the left mouse button and shooting everything that moves. You do this while moving to the right(usually at a slow rate) to get to the end of the level. Towards the middle there's usually a bonus stage. The bonus stages are either collect tons of coins, shoot tons of birds, or my least favorite shoot like 5-6 cans. At the end there's either 1 of three things, drive away and the stage ends, run from the birds who jacked your car, or beat a big ♥♥♥ chicken. Throughout the levels, you can go to the store to buy different upgrades, such as better guns, more health, etc. Did i mention the whole game is ♥♥♥♥ing funny as hell? The main character is a redneck, and a lot times when he kills something he says something about the enemy killed. My favorite being when he kills the bomber chicken and saysi think that one was a terrorist". And that's it
date: beating the games took me about 20 min. The game probably sounds like a massive cluster ♥♥♥♥ and that's because it is. I played this game a second time just because i enjoyed it so much. Overall i feel like this game is a ton of fun
recommended: and brings me back to when i used to play a ♥♥♥♥ ton of flash games. Do i recommend you give this a try? YES its fun
voteText: and killed about an hour of my time. Overall i would give this game a solid 6/10 based on price

reviewText: Join one man in his quest for vengence in the sequel to the Nintendo classic, Duck Hunt. Your paw, the hunter from the original duckhunt, is killed by his old enemies, the birds, and its up to you to take up the mantle of Bird Assassin and make feathers rain from the sky! An hour of dumb, mindless fun for less money than you'd pay for a candy bar.

reviewText: Bird Assassin pits you, a stereotypical redneck, against an evil ostrich who killed your dad. All the birds in the area want to kill you now. This is a pretty short arcade shooter with not a lot of depth. I beat the entire campaign in an hour (albeit on the easy difficulty level). There's not a lot to upgrade either - I had way more money than there were things to buy.

reviewText: Bird Assassin is a 2D twin stick shooter game where the goal is simple. Kill every bird you see but will you want to play this game ? In Bird Assassin we play as a redneck. One day our Pa is killed off by an Ostrich and its up to us to avenge the death of you're pa by killing all the birds. So how is this game ? It's actually really fun and for the price its also a really fun and a difficult game. The game is a 2D platformer where you scroll along the level killing birds and jumping on platforms to avoid bushes and bear traps. Overall the game is fairly simple and all the levels are the same but they get harder as they go on. There are a few problems with the game. The game is fairly short it only took me an hour to beat and its quite easy to get the best gun in the game and you can blast through the other levels easily. But for the asking price its definetly worth it and i really suggest you check this game out. I give Bird Assassin a 7.5/10

reviewText:
This game is funny and fun. And for 2 bucks why not right?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=90RTM0aZjr4&feature=youtu.be

Story is simple. Brids killed your old decrepit dad. His spirit charged you with getting revenge.

Now you get to play as a red neck hillbilly and use a variaty of weapons to kill a bunch of birds.
Kill birds to earn gold to buy better weapons to kill more birds to get gold to get better weapons.
Yep its a rip roaring good time and there is monus rounds and comedy and golden geese.

reviewText: I’ll be brief. The game is fun...for awhile. Its a budget title, but one in the worst way. Not only is it repetitive but it also overstays its welcome. The game has only nine levels, which in itself isn’t a bad thing, but it its worse with the repetition. Its just not the fun kind of repetition. Shooting through swaths of birds with a mini gun is actually made BORING in this title, even with unlimited ammo because of all the dense clouds of unending birds and max gun upgrades. You have to take your time cutting through and at times, there’s so much happening above and below that you can’t help but die.\n\nAlso they reuse the same boss three times without changing up anything about it. Long story short, pick it up on sale only if you must, do not pay full price.

it is the Weirdist game i have ever played in my intire life.
i completed the game in just over an hour and bought everything in the store
the voices from the characters are funny but could be better, the scenes are funny but not that many. It is a Gore Shoot em up game with a touch of comedy.
One of the major Problems i faced was i could take a screen shot through out the whole game, and only at the end itwould let me when it said THE END".

So i'm giving it a 4/10

reviewText: Screen scrolls right. You move around. You shoot ducks/birds. You jump over rocks/obstacles. Birds try to kill you. Duck Hunt meets Metal Slug meets Rednecks.\n\nAs ridiculous as it sounds, as insulting to rednecks as you can imagine, and yet I still had fun with this, especially when the developer plays with the formula. It won't change your life, it won't last long, but it's ridiculous in a good way.
